Segment.name: GA
Segment.comment: To transmit the transportation and distribution requirements of grain at Canadian ports

Field.name: FumigatedCleanedIndicator
Field.comment: Code indicating whether product has been fumigated and/or cleaned

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: InspectedWeighedIndicatorCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether product has been inspected and/or weighed

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Week
Field.comment: Week expressed as year/week (CCYYWW), where week is a number between 01 and 53 inclusive

Field.name: UnloadTerminalElevatorCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the unloading terminal elevator at grain exporting terminals

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: MachineSeparableIndicatorCode
Field.comment: Canadian Grain Commission grain code identifying the type of grain that must be separated

Field.name: CanadianWheatBoard1
Field.comment: Code identifying the Canadian Wheat Board market class of the grain

Field.name: CanadianWheatBoard2
Field.comment: Code identifying Canadian Wheat Board market class type

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either GA04 or GA05 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1415
SyntaxNote.comment: If either GA14 or GA15 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1617
SyntaxNote.comment: If either GA16 or GA17 is present, then the other is required.
